summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Iteration 10 features: NCERT Syllabus API (modular routes), Real NCERT curriculum data integration, and TeachTino Portal Enhancement. Backend APIs: 21/21 NCERT tests passed (100%). Frontend: TeachTino Dashboard working with NCERT syllabus progress, all 8 Quick Action buttons present. Previous features (Online Exams, CCTV, Storage, Activity Dashboard) still working.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/ncert/summary - Returns statistics (12 classes, 9 subjects, 241+ chapters, 726+ topics)
Backend: GET /api/ncert/classes - Returns all 12 classes (1-12)
Backend: GET /api/ncert/subjects/10 - Returns Class 10 subjects (Hindi, English, Mathematics, Science, Social Science)
Backend: GET /api/ncert/subjects/6 - Returns Class 6 subjects
Backend: GET /api/ncert/subjects/12 - Returns Class 12 subjects (Physics, Chemistry, Math, Biology)
Backend: GET /api/ncert/subjects/99 - Returns 404 for invalid class
Backend: GET /api/ncert/syllabus/10?subject=Science - Returns 16 chapters with topics
Backend: GET /api/ncert/syllabus/10?subject=Mathematics - Returns 15 chapters with topics
Backend: GET /api/ncert/syllabus/10 - Returns all subjects for class
Backend: GET /api/ncert/search?query=pythagoras - Finds matching topics in Mathematics
Backend: GET /api/ncert/search?query=photosynthesis - Search works correctly
Backend: GET /api/ncert/search?query=equation&class_num=10 - Class filter works
Backend: GET /api/ncert/search?query=a - Rejects queries < 2 chars (422)
Backend: GET /api/ncert/chapter/10/Mathematics/4 - Returns Quadratic Equations chapter
Backend: GET /api/ncert/chapter/10/Science/1 - Returns Chemical Reactions chapter
Backend: GET /api/ncert/chapter/10/Mathematics/99 - Returns 404 for non-existent chapter
Backend: GET /api/ncert/books - Returns all NCERT books (20+ books)
Backend: GET /api/ncert/progress-template/10/Mathematics - Returns progress tracking template
Backend: GET /api/ncert/progress-template/10/InvalidSubject - Returns 404
Backend: Class 10 data integrity verified - all subjects have chapters with topics
Backend: Summary statistics match actual data
Frontend: TeachTino Dashboard loads at /teacher-dashboard
Frontend: Syllabus Progress section shows Class 8, 9, 10 with NCERT data
Frontend: Quick Actions has all 8 buttons (Send Notice, Online Exams, Generate Paper, Mark Attendance, Students, Apply Leave, Meetings, AI Content)
Frontend: TeachTino AI Assistant section with file upload (Photo, Video, Document)
Frontend: Online Exams page working at /app/exams
Frontend: CCTV Dashboard working at /app/cctv (Director access)
Frontend: Storage & Backup page working at /app/storage
Frontend: Activity Dashboard working at /app/activity
critical_code_review_comments: Backend refactoring done correctly - NCERT routes moved to /app/backend/routes/ncert.py
NCERT service in /app/backend/services/ncert_syllabus.py contains real NCERT curriculum data
Data includes Class 1, 6, 10, 12 with full chapters and topics from official NCERT sources
Classes 2-5, 7-9, 11 have placeholder data (book names only, no chapters)
TeachTino Dashboard fetches NCERT data via /api/ncert/syllabus/{class}?subject=Mathematics
Syllabus progress cards show real NCERT chapter counts and current topics
NCERT data is STATIC (stored in Python dict) - not fetched live from NCERT website

success_rate.frontend: 100% (TeachTino Dashboard, Quick Actions, Previous features all working)

seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - using existing NCERT static data

mocked_apis_list: NCERT data is STATIC from official sources (https://ncert.nic.in) - stored in Python dict, not fetched live
Classes 2-5, 7-9, 11 have placeholder data (book names only)
TeachTino syllabus progress percentages are mock values (not from real tracking)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 10 features fully tested. NCERT API modular routes working: /api/ncert/summary, /api/ncert/classes, /api/ncert/subjects/{class}, /api/ncert/syllabus/{class}, /api/ncert/search, /api/ncert/chapter/{class}/{subject}/{num}, /api/ncert/books, /api/ncert/progress-template/{class}/{subject}. TeachTino Dashboard shows NCERT syllabus progress for Class 8, 9, 10 Mathematics. Quick Actions has 8 buttons including Online Exams, Mark Attendance, Meetings. Previous features (CCTV, Storage, Activity Dashboard) still working. NCERT data is static (from official sources) but stored in Python dict.
